accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority that signs the transaction

accounts.name: payer
docs: The payer of the transaction fees

errors.name: UnauthorizedBuyer
errors.msg: The provided buyer is not authorized to make this payment

errors.name: FirstPaymentBelowDeposit
errors.msg: First payment must meet the minimum payment

errors.name: InvalidEquipmentPrice
errors.msg: Equipment price must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidEquipmentName
errors.msg: Equipment name must not be empty

errors.name: BuyerSignatureRequired
errors.msg: The buyer must sign this transaction.

errors.name: SellerSignatureRequired
errors.msg: The seller must sign this transaction.

errors.name: BorrowerMismatch
errors.msg: Borrower does not match credit score record

errors.name: LoanNotFound
errors.msg: Loan not found for this borrower

errors.name: DepositBelowMinimum
errors.msg: Deposit is below the minimum set by the vendor

errors.name: DurationExceedsMax
errors.msg: Duration exceeds the maximum allowed by the vendor

errors.name: FundsAlreadyReleased
errors.msg: Funds have already been released from escrow

errors.name: MissingFunderUniqueId
errors.msg: Funder unique ID is required for funded equipment
